title: Seminar in Film Studies
description: An in-depth investigation of a major movement, theory, period, or technological development in film studies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2500 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
